actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to establish a National Center for the Handicapped.
short_title: National Center for the Handicapped Act
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: National Center for the Handicapped Act - Establishes a National Center for the Handicapped within the Office of the Secretary of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to serve as a national educational, research, and service model for the handicapped. Directs the Center to: (1) establish model educational and rehabilitation centers; (2) develop education programs and teach employment skills; (3) perform and expand research activities; and (4) develop programs and train educational and rehabilitation staff personnel.

titles.title: National Center for the Handicapped Act
A bill to establish a National Center for the Handicapped.
